Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: Multiple advocacy groups have called for more funding in this year's federal budget. A committee tasked with investigating the JobSeeker rate is calling for a substantial increase urging the government to provide much-needed support. General practitioners are demanding changes to help more Australians afford healthcare. Meanwhile the tough economic climate is expected to continue and demands for increased funding to prevent homelessness are being made. Some Australians are unhappy with the decision to not increase JobSeeker rates.
